CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 15, 1962, pg. 5 reads: "Send-Off For Mal - There were several organizations and groups giving Mal Goode a sound sendoff for his job with ABC-TV, and among them were The Pittsburgh Courier family and friends. At a Loendi Club affair, Friday night, the following scenes were (first two pictures from the left) the honoree's table, which showed (left to right) Mr. and Mrs. Frank Lavelle, Mrs. Ruth White, sister of Mal; Ernie Austin, Mr. Goode, Mrs. Robert L. Vann, president and treasurer of The Pittsburgh Courier, and the honoree, Mal Goode; James Goode and his wife, Louise, and Mr. and Mrs. William Goode...Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Mr. and Mrs. Frank Lavelle, Ruth White, Ernie Austin, Mrs. Mal Goode, Jessie Vann, and Mal Goode, posed around u-shaped banquet tables for Mal Goode send off, Loendi Club
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Loendi Club (Pittsburgh, Pa.).Vann, Jessie, 1889-1967.Banquets--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Goode, Mal, 1908-1995.Lavelle, Frank.
